channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Feeling the Effects of the Time Change? We Asked Experts How to Get Back on Track
item.description: The end of daylight saving time is disruptive to circadian rhythms, but there are some things you can do to help yourself reset.

item.title: University of Pennsylvania confirms hacker stole data during cyberattack
item.description: Penn experienced a data breach on Friday as hackers sent messages boasting of the hack to the university community.

item.title: Whisper Into This AI-Powered Smart Ring to Organize Your Thoughts
item.description: A new company called Sandbar has unveiled a smart wearable called Stream Ring, which uses a microphone to record your softly spoken thoughts. And it’s...

item.title: Meze Audio 105 Silva Headphones Review: Look Great, Sound Better
item.description: These open-back headphones are no good for your commute, but sure make staying at home fun.

item.title: Epic Games CEO calls Google’s antitrust settlement a win for Android’s ‘vision as an open platform’
item.description: The companies on Tuesday reached a settlement that sees the search giant agreeing to Android app store reforms that include lowering fees and enabling...

item.title: Former Meta employees launch a ring to take voice notes and control music
item.description: A raft of voice-based hardware devices have emerged, aimed at companionship, productivity, or personal growth. These include card-shaped devices from ...

item.title: This startup’s metal stacks could help solve AI’s massive heat problem
item.description: Alloy Enterprises has developed a new additive manufacturing technique that can improve liquid cooling performance while bringing it to new parts of t...

item.title: Google gets the US government’s green light to acquire Wiz for $32B
item.description: Google announced its intent to acquire cloud security company Wiz in March and the deal is now on track to close in early 2026.

item.title: Motion Picture Association hits Meta with cease-and-desist over use of ‘PG-13’ label
item.description: The MPA sent Meta a cease-and-desist over its use of the term 'PG-13' in Instagram teen ratings system.

item.title: The CIA Used This Psychic Meditation Program. It’s Never Been More Popular
item.description: The Monroe Institute claims its meditations, which have also been used by the US military, help people access different planes of consciousness. Its v...
